title: Chah Dashi Marl
content: On the way from Nehbandan to Chah Dashi in south Khorasan province, one can see such an eye-catching erosion phenomenon. The Neogene formations of marl, conglomerate, silt, and sandstone in various red, brown, cream, and white colors have created a rare landscape. The structure of this picturesque area is like the undeveloped badlands.
